plot: A high-powered corporate executive, consumed by her work and the drive for success, has a chance encounter with a homeless man on her way home from work one night, and a conversation that profoundly shifts her life.
title: Ephemeral
plot_es: A high-powered corporate executive, consumed by her work and the drive for success, has a chance encounter with a homeless man on her way home from work one night, and a conversation that profoundly shifts her life.
plot_en: A high-powered corporate executive, consumed by her work and the drive for success, has a chance encounter with a homeless man on her way home from work one night, and a conversation that profoundly shifts her life.
